name: Dodge
description: Use your mouse to move around the game area avoiding cubes and getting the highest score you can set. Your score only depends by your reflexes and skills, so if you lose, the bad is all yours. Enjoy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 (K8) 2.6 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics with OpenGL 2.1 Storage: 100 MB available space
